title: 🏡Spacious Studio Apartment | Heat & Water inlcuded!💦
posting_body: ['Newly decorated & spacious studio apartments available in the Hyde Park/Kenwood area- just minutes away from Lake Shore Drive and the Loop.', '🏙️', 'Vintage, well-manicured building with courtyard, on-site management, security cameras, bike room, and a 🧺laundry facility!', 'Includes: Kitchen appliances, hardwood/laminate floors, excellent closet space.', 'Rent: $875 and up', 'Heat and water already included in the rent!', '🙌', '🚗  Off-street parking lot located to the north of the building with assigned parking for extra monthly fee, while spots are available.', '🚌  Excellent public transportation options', 'Less than 2 miles from University of Chicago (to the south); less than 2 miles from IIT (to the northwest); less than 4.5 miles from University of Illinois - Chicago (to the northwest); less than 4.5 miles from Columbia College (to the north)', 'University of Chicago and CPD service area 🏢', '📞 Call Redel Rentals today at 866-451-6837 to schedule a viewing appointment.', 'Office Hours: M-F, 9am - 5pm 📅', 'We offer socially distant, in-person viewings and virtual tours via Facetime/Zoom.', '*', 'For more information, please visit our site  <URL>']
